testCase.name: RoomController getAllRooms should return all rooms successfully
RoomController getAllRooms should handle errors when getting all rooms
RoomController getRoomById should return a room by id successfully
RoomController getRoomById should return 404 when room is not found
RoomController getRoomById should return 400 for invalid room id format
RoomController getRoomById should handle errors when getting a room by id
RoomController createRoom should create a room successfully
RoomController createRoom should return 400 when name is missing
RoomController createRoom should return 400 when capacity is invalid
RoomController createRoom should handle validation errors
RoomController createRoom should handle other errors when creating a room
RoomController updateRoom should update a room successfully
RoomController updateRoom should return 400 for invalid room id format
RoomController updateRoom should return 400 when no update data is provided
RoomController updateRoom should return 404 when room is not found
RoomController updateRoom should handle validation errors
RoomController updateRoom should handle other errors when updating a room
RoomController deleteRoom should delete a room successfully
RoomController deleteRoom should return 400 for invalid room id format
RoomController deleteRoom should return 404 when room is not found
RoomController deleteRoom should handle errors when deleting a room
RoomService getAllRooms should return all rooms when no filters are provided
RoomService getAllRooms should return filtered rooms when filters are provided
RoomService getAllRooms should throw an error when repository throws an error
RoomService getRoomById should return a room when a valid id is provided
RoomService getRoomById should throw an error when repository throws an error
RoomService createRoom should create and return a new room
RoomService createRoom should throw an error when repository throws an error
RoomService updateRoom should update and return the updated room
RoomService updateRoom should throw an error when room is not found
RoomService updateRoom should throw an error when repository throws an error
RoomService deleteRoom should delete a room and return true
RoomService deleteRoom should throw an error when room is not found
RoomService deleteRoom should throw an error when repository throws an error
